post.body: But daaa-aad, it's RESEARCH. Wanna come?
You guys have pretty great customer service, too. This may encourage people to be more adorable :)
Ya rly! I try to use it for things sometimes and get sort of sad when it's totally useless
like 6 people read my blog and only like 2 of them are not related to me and have never dated me
Does tribal ritual add value if it is expected by your customers?
I JUST SAW HIM IN MY BACKYARD
That depends on what they're making you do.
Whenevarz. Just give me a call first to make sure I'll be around. And awake.
me too. or I'll just drink approx. 3x my normal amount of tea on Monday, which adds up, in total, to "a lot of tea"
That's who she reminded me of!
Probably! I'm sure Mom would be thrilled if you drove off after dark to look for it.
I think what one does on New Year's Eve involves illegal fireworks in the street in front of your house. Less cops there than here.
no, FB thinks you think you're fat and wrinkly! it's ok, it has me down as totally slutty
Also, you're likely to believe people who are more similar to you and FB figured out that you're a mom
shindig with a group of friends. Wanna come?
this is why I have the best life ever.
my house or my next door neighbor's sex lives? I'm hoping the latter isn't 'cause of the whole "same building" thing
You know, I'm not sure @jfleck has ever actually forbidden me to do anything. Perhaps he will in the Long Emergency.
I sort of think I should learn to shoot a gun over winter vacation, to make myself a better zombie fiction writer. Anyone want to join me?
I wish that iTunes had a tagging functionality so I could tag all the instrumental songs and record labels.
auugh that tweet was sent too soon. It was supposed to have a link to http://www.playingforkeepsnovel.com/ at the end.
Third Wave power idea: Static electricity control (and if you don't know what I'm talking about, read/listen to Playing for Keeps:
Starting to have the same problem @jfleck has with Zappa coming up to much on Shuffle All, but with Belle and Sebastian.
(Would that really be that bad of a loss? I mean really, Shakespeare and Dickenson are dead)
In the Long Emergency, will spam be our only poetry?
A twitter spambot seems to be retweeting UNM live tweets but taking the links out. Its other tweets are vaguely poetic, like spam text.
Signs are way bigger than we would guess they are: http://bit.ly/LPNe What else is a lot bigger or smaller than we realize?
would it be wrong to tell buffalo exchange not to email me unless they have nice knee-high black laceup boots in my size (Women's 7)?
why is buffalo exchange sending me press releases?
just got to the part in Lost with Slaughterhouse-5 references. hee!
slept all morning and am actually feeling a lot better than I did when I woke up. yay!
carne adovada was supposed to make me better. Frontier, how can you fail me so?
In the Long Emergency, will I lie about having a backyard?
omg this is amazing. and in #ABQ. http://www.flickr.com/photos/variolax/3158930852/
IN THE LONG EMERGENCY, WILL THERE BE CAPS LOCK?
In the Long Emergency, will we be able to FUCK put obscenities in BITCH the blog columns of our immediate family via SHIT twitter search?
I want a delicious lunch but nothing is open :(
happy new year. if you're reading this: drink some fucking water. you'll thank me tomorrow.
I love you, Metafilter.
my neighbors have a LOT of sex
